structured_data.overview: Information page about the Planning Division's active projects in the City of El Segundo, including resources for approved and pending projects, and how to sign up for updates on planning topics.

forms.name: Planning Updates Signup
forms.purpose: To receive updates related to zoning, projects, CEQA, Planning Commission, and other planning topics

signup_info.description: Sign up for updates related to zoning, projects, CEQA, Planning Commission, and other planning topics

structured_data.other_info: The Planning Division provides resources for viewing approved projects and pending projects within the city. Citizens can submit inquiries to the Planning Division through the EZ Permit Hub portal.
